about_the_game:
Skidaddle Skidoodle is a single-player arcade game where you play as a small gnome mage striving to protect the forest and its inhabitants from evil creatures that disrupt nature's harmony. Use various spells to defeat the invaders and bring back the warm and peaceful days to the forest. Control the number of enemies and restore the balance of nature's forces in this magical realm.



Key Features:
  • Immersive Single-Player Experience: Engage in thrilling solo missions with diverse enemies and challenging levels.
  • Rich Arsenal of Spells: Master a wide range of magical spells to strategically defeat various foes.
  • Charming Protagonist: Step into the shoes of a lovable gnome mage dedicated to defending the forest.
  • Enchanting Visuals and Sound: Enjoy a beautifully crafted world with stunning graphics and an enchanting soundtrack.
  • Dynamic Nature Balance: Restore harmony by managing enemy populations and bringing balance back to the magical forest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
